lead_paragraph: About a billion people in the developing world have basic smartphones, and for many of them, it’s their only computer and communication device.

headline.print_headline: Where Phones Are Lifelines, Start-Ups Spy Opportunities
headline.main: Where Cellphones Are Lifelines, Start-Ups Spy Opportunities

snippet: About a billion people in the developing world have basic smartphones, and for many of them, it’s their only computer and communication device....
abstract: Several start-ups are finding new ways use data gleaned from smartphones of customers in developing world, including gauging creditworthiness of those who have no credit score.
